title: 7 PlayStation Indies Announcements! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.17.21
description:
Go to http://burrow.com/games to get $75 off your first order!  Blessing and Andy unite to talk about a bunch of PlayStation Indies announcements, EA Game Pass coming to PC, and more!  

Donate to stop Anti-Asian violence: https://anti-asianviolenceresources.carrd.co/

00:00:00 - Start
00:03:12 - Housekeeping
A new episode of The Blessing Show is up and this week, thanks to your support on Patreon, GREG MILLER takes over. Go check out the latest episode to see Greg break down how to save Marvel’s Avengers. Up now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
The Roper Report   -
00:07:44 - PlayStation is doing their indie spotlight today!
00:20:15 -  EA Play is Coming to PC Game Pass - News.Xbox.Com
00:26: - Activision Fires Dozens Amid Shift Away From Live Events - Jason Schreier @ Bloomberg
00:39:20 -  Ad
00:44:20 - A fun one: Rockstar has paid a modder $10,000 for fixing GTA Load Times - Cass Marshall @ Polygon
00:49:00 - Stadia is losing one of its few exclusives: Super Bomberman R Online - Matt Wales @ Eurogamer
00:50:59 -  BREAKING NEWS: Play at Home 2021 update: 10 free games to download this spring, PS Blog
00:54:50 - Out today
00:57:30 - Squad Up:Anonymous(Twitter, and real life) https://anti-asianviolenceresources.carrd.co/
01:00:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Bless and Parris
